attributes.action: Stop Oldham Tommyfield Market from being turned into an Asian Bazaar
attributes.background: Tommyfield is historic - over 150 years old and the first place in the country to serve fish and chips!! This latest Council proposal is another step in the wilful destruction of the market. Specialist markets are fine - but by their nature they cater for only ONE section of a community.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Markets in Oldham are the responsibility of Oldham council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:
http://committees.oldham.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx
